title: travelplanner: I need assistance in planning a week-long vacation for 2 individuals, starting from Chattanooga and covering 3 cities in Georgia. This trip will span from March 24th to March 30th, 2022, with a budget cap at $6,800. We'll be traveling with our children who are under 10 years old, hence, accommodations must be children-friendly and should ideally be entire rooms. For this trip, we would prefer not to take any flights. (3f5cb0b59f9be595)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: I need assistance in planning a week-long vacation for 2 individuals, starting from Chattanooga and covering 3 cities in Georgia. This trip will span from March 24th to March 30th, 2022, with a budget cap at $6,800. We'll be traveling with our children who are under 10 years old, hence, accommodations must be children-friendly and should ideally be entire rooms. For this trip, we would prefer not to take any flights.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Plan a week-long vacation for 2 adults and children under 10 years old, starting from Chattanooga and covering 3 cities in Georgia from March 24th to March 30th, 2022. The budget is $6,800. The trip should not include flights, and accommodations must be children-friendly and entire rooms. Provide details for transportation, breakfast, attractions, lunch, dinner, and accommodation for each day."}

chat_history.content:
### Vacation Plan for 2 Adults and Children under 10 years old

#### Overview:
- **Dates**: March 24th to March 30th, 2022
- **Cities**: Atlanta, Savannah, Augusta
- **Budget**: $6,800
- **Transportation**: Self-driving
- **Accommodation**: Children-friendly, entire rooms
- **Meals**: Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner
- **Attractions**: Family-friendly

### Day 1: March 24th, 2022 - Chattanooga to Atlanta
- **Transportation**: Drive from Chattanooga to Atlanta (approx. 2 hours)
- **Accommodation**: Bright central designer's apt - steps to train! ($1019 per night, accommodates 10)
- **Breakfast**: Local cafe in Chattanooga
- **Lunch**: Saffron (Tea, Cafe, Fast Food, Seafood)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Atlanta Botanical Garden
  - World of Coca-Cola
- **Dinner**: Daawat-e-Kashmir (Cafe, Pizza, American, Seafood)

### Day 2: March 25th, 2022 - Atlanta
- **Accommodation**: Bright central designer's apt - steps to train!
- **Breakfast**: Chef Style (Pizza, American, Desserts, Seafood)
- **Lunch**: Pizza Central (Cafe, Bakery, BBQ, Fast Food, Chinese, Indian)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Georgia Aquarium
  - Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park
- **Dinner**: Shri Ram Restaurant (Tea, Mexican, Indian, Fast Food)

### Day 3: March 26th, 2022 - Atlanta
- **Accommodation**: Bright central designer's apt - steps to train!
- **Breakfast**: Sizzler's Ranch (Tea, Cafe, Indian, Italian)
- **Lunch**: Bengali Sweet House (Desserts, American, BBQ, Pizza)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Piedmont Park
  - High Museum of Art
- **Dinner**: Chaina Ram Sindhi Confectioners (Desserts, Pizza, BBQ, Mediterranean, Seafood)

### Day 4: March 27th, 2022 - Atlanta to Savannah
- **Transportation**: Drive from Atlanta to Savannah (approx. 3.5 hours)
- **Accommodation**: Alpha-Bet City entire floor large cool 2br -L.E.S ($574 per night, accommodates 4)
- **Breakfast**: Local cafe in Atlanta
- **Lunch**: Sr. Sol 1 (Tea, French, Mediterranean, Desserts)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Forsyth Park
  - Wormsloe State Historic Site
- **Dinner**: Country's Barbecue (Cafe, Bakery)

### Day 5: March 28th, 2022 - Savannah
- **Accommodation**: Alpha-Bet City entire floor large cool 2br -L.E.S
- **Breakfast**: Manohar Dairy And Restaurant (Tea, Indian, Fast Food)
- **Lunch**: Bosphorous Turkish Cuisine (Pizza, Indian, Fast Food)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Mercer-Williams House Museum
  - Savannah Historic District
- **Dinner**: The Mad Teapot/The Wishing Chair (Mexican, Bakery, Fast Food)

### Day 6: March 29th, 2022 - Savannah to Augusta
- **Transportation**: Drive from Savannah to Augusta (approx. 2.5 hours)
- **Accommodation**: Planta Baja Studio ($637 per night, accommodates 4)
- **Breakfast**: Local cafe in Savannah
- **Lunch**: B Merrell's (Tea, Pizza, Desserts, Fast Food)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Phinizy Swamp Nature Park
  - Augusta Riverwalk
- **Dinner**: Vinny Vanucchi's (Desserts, Fast Food, Chinese, Indian, Seafood)

### Day 7: March 30th, 2022 - Augusta to Chattanooga
- **Transportation**: Drive from Augusta to Chattanooga (approx. 4.5 hours)
- **Breakfast**: Fish Tales Lakeside Grille (Tea, Cafe, Bakery, Desserts)
- **Lunch**: The Charcoal Chimney (Tea, Fast Food, BBQ, Italian)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Augusta Museum of History
  - Morris Museum of Art
- **Dinner**: Nikhil Food Point (Tea, Mexican, Fast Food, American, Seafood)

### Budget Breakdown:
- **Accommodation**: Approx. $5,000
- **Meals**: Approx. $1,000
- **Attractions**: Approx. $500
- **Transportation (Fuel)**: Approx. $300

This plan ensures a comfortable and enjoyable vacation within the budget, covering all essential aspects including transportation, accommodation, meals, and attractions.
chat_history.name: delegate

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"

chat_history.content:
### Vacation Plan for 2 Adults and Children under 10 years old

#### Overview:
- **Dates**: March 24th to March 30th, 2022
- **Cities**: Atlanta, Savannah, Augusta
- **Budget**: $6,800
- **Transportation**: Self-driving
- **Accommodation**: Children-friendly, entire rooms
- **Meals**: Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner
- **Attractions**: Family-friendly

### Day 1: March 24th, 2022 - Chattanooga to Atlanta
- **Transportation**: Drive from Chattanooga to Atlanta (approx. 2 hours)
- **Accommodation**: Bright central designer's apt - steps to train! ($1019 per night, accommodates 10)
- **Breakfast**: Local cafe in Chattanooga
- **Lunch**: Saffron (Tea, Cafe, Fast Food, Seafood)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Atlanta Botanical Garden
  - World of Coca-Cola
- **Dinner**: Daawat-e-Kashmir (Cafe, Pizza, American, Seafood)

### Day 2: March 25th, 2022 - Atlanta
- **Accommodation**: Bright central designer's apt - steps to train!
- **Breakfast**: Chef Style (Pizza, American, Desserts, Seafood)
- **Lunch**: Pizza Central (Cafe, Bakery, BBQ, Fast Food, Chinese, Indian)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Georgia Aquarium
  - Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park
- **Dinner**: Shri Ram Restaurant (Tea, Mexican, Indian, Fast Food)

### Day 3: March 26th, 2022 - Atlanta
- **Accommodation**: Bright central designer's apt - steps to train!
- **Breakfast**: Sizzler's Ranch (Tea, Cafe, Indian, Italian)
- **Lunch**: Bengali Sweet House (Desserts, American, BBQ, Pizza)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Piedmont Park
  - High Museum of Art
- **Dinner**: Chaina Ram Sindhi Confectioners (Desserts, Pizza, BBQ, Mediterranean, Seafood)

### Day 4: March 27th, 2022 - Atlanta to Savannah
- **Transportation**: Drive from Atlanta to Savannah (approx. 3.5 hours)
- **Accommodation**: Alpha-Bet City entire floor large cool 2br -L.E.S ($574 per night, accommodates 4)
- **Breakfast**: Local cafe in Atlanta
- **Lunch**: Sr. Sol 1 (Tea, French, Mediterranean, Desserts)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Forsyth Park
  - Wormsloe State Historic Site
- **Dinner**: Country's Barbecue (Cafe, Bakery)

### Day 5: March 28th, 2022 - Savannah
- **Accommodation**: Alpha-Bet City entire floor large cool 2br -L.E.S
- **Breakfast**: Manohar Dairy And Restaurant (Tea, Indian, Fast Food)
- **Lunch**: Bosphorous Turkish Cuisine (Pizza, Indian, Fast Food)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Mercer-Williams House Museum
  - Savannah Historic District
- **Dinner**: The Mad Teapot/The Wishing Chair (Mexican, Bakery, Fast Food)

### Day 6: March 29th, 2022 - Savannah to Augusta
- **Transportation**: Drive from Savannah to Augusta (approx. 2.5 hours)
- **Accommodation**: Planta Baja Studio ($637 per night, accommodates 4)
- **Breakfast**: Local cafe in Savannah
- **Lunch**: B Merrell's (Tea, Pizza, Desserts, Fast Food)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Phinizy Swamp Nature Park
  - Augusta Riverwalk
- **Dinner**: Vinny Vanucchi's (Desserts, Fast Food, Chinese, Indian, Seafood)

### Day 7: March 30th, 2022 - Augusta to Chattanooga
- **Transportation**: Drive from Augusta to Chattanooga (approx. 4.5 hours)
- **Breakfast**: Fish Tales Lakeside Grille (Tea, Cafe, Bakery, Desserts)
- **Lunch**: The Charcoal Chimney (Tea, Fast Food, BBQ, Italian)
- **Attractions**: 
  - Augusta Museum of History
  - Morris Museum of Art
- **Dinner**: Nikhil Food Point (Tea, Mexican, Fast Food, American, Seafood)

### Budget Breakdown:
- **Accommodation**: Approx. $5,000
- **Meals**: Approx. $1,000
- **Attractions**: Approx. $500
- **Transportation (Fuel)**: Approx. $300

This plan ensures a comfortable and enjoyable vacation within the budget, covering all essential aspects including transportation, accommodation, meals, and attractions.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
